definition: the contestant you hope to defeat, be the rival of, be in competition with
details:
noun
- the contestant you hope to defeat
= example: the contestant you hope to defeat
= synonyms: competition
verb
- be the rival of, be in competition with
= example: be the rival of, be in competition with
- be equal to in quality or ability
= example: be equal to in quality or ability
= synonyms: touch
